column5: Going up to Lake of Woods last week in May. Where would the best place be to park my truck and boat trailer for a week? I'll probably launch out of Kenora but could go out of Clearwater Bay. Any thoughts?
Lassh, try Bare Point Marina. Nice folks and plenty or parking. You will have to pay a fee. I have personally used this harbour many times over the years. Just give them a call. (807)548-2120.

Northern harbour owner not very friendly , certainly not a people person. I had been there as well several times but will not return. It seems everyone out of country using that marina is just a burden to him unless he has recently sold out to someone else. Haven't been back there in 7 years. If someone knows if things have changed please chime in.

The rec center across the creek from Safeway. Cheap and easy access."contact Kenora Recreation Centre at 467-2087"Found this:http://www.kenora.ca/cityhall/city-s...s/parking.aspxOvernight parking is permitted at the Kenora Recreation Centre Lot 6, Anicinabe Boat Launch and at Keewatin Memorial Arena front lot. These are the only City owned lots that permit vehicles in excess of 6.7 meters and overnight parking.
